meaning: half, middle, odd number, semi-, part-

onyomiExamples.meaning: half, semi-, half-past, odd number, unit of land area (595.8 m^2)
half the amount (of money), half price, half fare
four and a half tatami mats, four-and-a-half-mat room, small room esp. for assignations

kunyomiExamples.meaning: middle, halfway, midway, half (of), one half, half (e.g. done, jokingly), partly, in part, partially, mostly, almost, nearly
